bool satisfied (const Cell &cell, unsigned int fromPart, unsigned int toPart) const
 Check if the moved is OK.

Detailed Description

Bi-partitioning Constraints Manager (version 3). Mainly to answer question "Is a vertex allowed to move from one partition to another?". In this version, we relax the constraint so that a cell can move if it is not increasing the violation of the constraints. Although the performance in general is better than the traditional approach, the final result may not guarantee to be satisfied the constraints.

See also:
BiConstrMgr
